member.name: M:YandexDiskRestClient.YandexDiskRest.GetResInfo(System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.String,System.Nullable{YandexDiskRestClient.SortField},YandexDiskRestClient.ResFields[],System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.String)
member.summary: Get meta information about file or folder, dy default get meta information root disk
member.param: Maximum number of output resources, default 20
Path to resource. Required value in Url - format. Example 'old/new/good.txt'
A field for sorting the nested resources. The example 'SortField.Created' is sorted by the date of creation of the resource
An array of return fields. Example 'new ResFields [] {ResFields.Name, ResFields.Type, ResFields.Size}'
Offset from the beginning of the list of nested resources.
Allow trimming the preview.
The size of the preview. Example "120x240"
member.returns: The return value of the ResInfo structure

member.summary: Get a list of files ordered by name (structure ResInfo._Embedded), a flat list of all files in the Drive in alphabetical order.

An array of file types to include in the list. Example 'new Media_type [] {Media_type.Unknown, Media_type.Text}'
A field for sorting the nested resources. Example 'SortField.Size' sort by file size
An array of return fields. Example 'new ResFields [] {ResFields.Name, ResFields.Type, ResFields.Size}'
Offset from the beginning of the list of nested resources.
Allow trimming the preview.
The size of the preview. Example "120x240"
member.returns: The return value of the ResInfo._Embedded structure

An array of file types to include in the list. Example 'new Media_type [] {Media_type.Unknown, Media_type.Text}'

Allow trimming the preview.

Offset from the beginning of the list of nested resources.
Allow trimming the preview.
The size of the preview. Example "120x240"

member.name: M:YandexDiskRestClient.YandexDiskRest.DeleteResource(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Delete the file or folder. By default, it will delete the resource in the Recycle Bin. To remove the resource without placing it in the Recycle Bin, specify the recycle = false parameter.
member.param: The path to the file or folder. The path in the parameter value should be encoded in the URL format. Example 'old/test.txt'
Remove resource to Recycle bin. Default is true
member.returns: The return value of the ErrorResponse structure with null values if successful, else error message

Overwrite an existing resource.

Allow trimming the preview.
